properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come my Savior and help me Comfort strengthen and keep me Thou each moment wilt save me Thou art saving me now{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}More holiness give me More sweetness within More patience in suffering More sorrow for sin More faith in my Saviour More sense of His care More joy in His service More freedom in prayer{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}More gratitude give me More trust in the Lord More pride in His glory More hope in His word More tears for His sorrows More pain at His grief More meekness in trial More praise for relief{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}More victory give me More strength to o'er come More freedom from earth-stains More longings for home More fit for the kingdom More useful I'd be More blessed and holy More Saviour like Thee{/lang-eng}
